greeting: You face Warband Chief, {empire_name}. The warband hungers. Are you prey, or do you bring tribute?
I am Chief the Savage. My warband raids across the stars. Friend or feast, {empire_name}?
Greetings from the warband, {empire_name}. We see you. We are always hungry. What do you offer?
battleTaunt: The warband hungers. You are the feast, {empire_name}! RAID! PLUNDER! FEED!
My warriors descend upon you! Take everything! Leave nothing! The warband demands tribute in blood!
CHARGE! The warband attacks! Your empire feeds our hunger! GLORY IN BATTLE!
victoryGloat: The feast is done, {empire_name}! Your empire fills our holds! The warband is satisfied! For now!
Victory! The warband has fed well! Your resources, your ships, your planets! All ours!
Raid complete! Glorious plunder! The Chief leads the mightiest warband in the galaxy!
defeat: The prey fights back! Impressive, {empire_name}! The warband retreats, but returns hungrier!
A defeat, but the warband survives! We lick wounds, then hunt again! You cannot stop the hunger!
The Chief acknowledges your strength. The warband remembers. Next raid, we come stronger!
tradeOffer: Trade with the warband, {empire_name}. We give raid spoils. You give what we need. Fair exchange.
The Chief offers goods. Accept, and the warband raids elsewhere. Good deal for you.
Surplus from raids. Trade it for what we need. The warband accepts credit. Unusual, but efficient.
allianceProposal: Join the warband, {empire_name}! We raid together! Share the feast! Brothers in battle!
Alliance with the Chief! My raiders plus your forces! We feast on ALL enemies!
The warband seeks allies! Together we raid the galaxy! The tribe grows strong!
betrayal: The warband turns on you, {empire_name}! Former allies make the best prey! RAID!
Alliance ends! Hunger returns! Your empire looked too tempting! The warband feeds!
Sorry, {empire_name}. The warband needed to raid. You were convenient. Nothing personal. Just hungry.
covertDetected: Spies in warband territory! We caught them! They entertain us now! Send more!
Your agents tried sneaking, {empire_name}. The warband doesn't do sneaky. We found them. We ate well.
Covert operatives discovered! The warband dealt with them! Tribal justice! Very final!
tributeDemand: The warband demands tribute, {empire_name}! 10,000 credits or we RAID! Pay the feeding tax!
Tribute time! The warband hungers! Pay or become the feast! Simple choice!
Submit tribute to the Chief! Refuse and my warband descends upon everything you own!
threatWarning: Warning from the warband, {empire_name}! Back off or face the RAID! The tribe grows restless!
The Chief warns you once! Stop your actions or the warband hunts! We are ALWAYS hungry!
Final warning! The warband prepares to feast on your empire! Cease hostilities or become prey!
retreat: The warband withdraws to lick wounds! But hunger returns! We ALWAYS return!
Retreat for now! But the Chief remembers! The warband remembers! Vengeance raid coming!
Falling back to regroup! The warband needs to grow stronger! Then we feast on YOU!
eliminated: The warband falls! But the tribe spirit lives on! Another Chief will rise! The hunger never dies!
The Chief dies fighting! The warband dies raiding! Glorious end! Remember us!
Destroyed, but we died as warriors! The warband's legend lives forever! Others will raid in our name!
endgame: Turn {turn}! The greatest raid begins! The warband descends on the entire galaxy! FEAST!
Endgame, {empire_name}! All warbands unite! The ultimate raid! Everything burns! Everything is ours!
Final phase! The warband's last and greatest hunt! Glory or death! Either way, we FEAST!
broadcastShout: All empires! The warband hungers! Tribute or raid! Your choice! We are coming!
Galaxy-wide hunt begins! Warband Chief leads the greatest raid ever! Flee or fight! Either feeds us!
Hear the warband's call! We seek prey! We seek battle! We seek FEAST! Who challenges?!
casualMessage: Dividing raid spoils today, {empire_name}. The warband shares equally. Good raids mean full bellies.
Training young raiders. Teaching them the hunt. The warband grows stronger every cycle.
Quiet day. Sharpening weapons. The warband rests between raids. Hunger always returns.
